name: Heads 'N' Tails
description:
Welcome to Heads 'N' Tails!

You have been recruited to manage your own growing pet shop!

Create your character, care for pets, serve customers and personalise your store in this 3rd person overwhelming simulation game!

Controls:

Left Mouse Button (Click): All interactions, movement, button presses.

Esc: Pause game

Created by MilkSop Games:

Alan Horton (Technical Designer), Eli De Carteret (Level Designer), Robyn Murphy (Character Artist), Laura Flinders (Environment Artist), Cat Wiltshire (Prop Artist).

Visit MilkSop Games on Twitter: @MilkSopGames
